characterDescription:
Davim is a male workform Parshendi who serves on their ruling council, the Council of Five, in their city of Narak.
Davim believes that if Surgebindings are back, that it might indicate that their gods are returning anyway and that forms of power will help with that.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is broad faced, his workform skin marbled mostly of black with tiny swirls of red here and there.
